text: The ramps from EB 401, NB/SB 427 to Eglinton have been closed because of a gas leak, Eglinton closed from Martin Grove to Kipling
32 Eglinton West diverting both ways via Wincott, Hunting Ridge, Clement, Martin Grove, due to a natural gas leak at Eglinton and Kipling.
